quote: She’s happier than Nicola. That’s probably true. Alcoholics can stop drinking but what is there for the children of alcoholics? Is it always too late? Probably. She doesn’t know.
quote_letters: SHES HAPPIER THAN NICOLA THATS PROBABLY TRUE ALCOHOLICS CAN STOP DRINKING BUT WHAT IS THERE FOR THE CHILDREN OF ALCOHOLICS IS IT ALWAYS TOO LATE PROBABLY SHE DOESNT KNOW
